title: Who We Are
lyrics: Intro:  x2 Mom and Dad Don,t worry about your son I'll be ok I'll take these days one by one though the times are hard I still know where I belong I keep looking up so I can hold on For now I'll choose this life I live And for now I'll choose to take my hits 'Cause at the end of the day all we have is who we are * * * * Life hurry now I'm running out of time And I'm growing weak as are these dreams that are mine Though the days are long I'm still running strong I keep looking up so I can hold  on For now I'll choose this life I live And for now I'll choose to take my hits 'Cause at the end of the day all we have is who we  are For now I'll choose this life I live And for now I'll choose to take my hits 'Cause at the end of the day all we have is who we are At the end of the day all we have is who we  are At the end of the day all we have is who we are
